column1: BBC News NI outlines the latest data on coronavirus and Covid-19 vaccinations across Northern Ireland and the Republic of Ireland.Four Covid-19-related deaths have been reported in Northern Ireland on Friday.Deaths are measured by recording those who died within 28 days of receiving a positive result in a test for coronavirus.The total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in Northern Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 2
column3: 908 new cases of coronavirus were reported in Northern Ireland on Friday
column5: 272 on Thursday.That includes cases confirmed from samples taken in recent days
column6: not necessarily just in the latest 24-hour reporting period.The number of positive cases confirmed in the past seven days was 12
column9: 684 in the previous seven days. There are 326 patients with Covid-19 in hospitals in Northern Ireland
column10: up from 324 on Thursday.There are 30 patients with Covid-19 in hospital intensive care units
column11: the same number as on Thursday. Last updated 3 December at 14:10 GMTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandA total of 3
column13: 767 vaccines for Covid-19 had been administered in Northern Ireland as of Friday.Of those
column16: 040 of the jabs were first doses
column20: 871 were third doses.The remainder were booster jabs.Last updated 3 December at 14:10 GMTSource: Department of Health Northern IrelandThe total number of deaths linked to Covid-19 in the Republic of Ireland since the start of the pandemic is 5
column23: is updated weekly and includes "probable and possible" Covid-19-linked deaths.Another 4
column24: 163 cases of coronavirus were reported in the Republic of Ireland on Thursday
column26: 793 on Wednesday.There are 545 patients with Covid-19 in hospitals in the Republic of Ireland.There are 117 patients with Covid-19 in hospital intensive care units.Last updated 2 December at 18:00 local timeSource: Department of Health IrelandA total of 7
column28: 467 vaccines for Covid-19 had been administered in the Republic of Ireland as of Wednesday.A total of 3
column30: 499 people have had their first dose and 3

column33: 780 booster jabs have been administered.Last updated 1 December at 18:00 local timeSource: Department of Health Ireland
